title: User Authentication
description: Implement user registration and login functionality for students and instructors. This ensures that only authorized users can access and interact with the site.

title: Assignment Creation
description: Allow instructors to create and publish assignments. Include options for specifying assignment details like title, description, due date, and maximum points.

title: Assignment Submission Confirmation
description: Notify students upon successful submission of assignments and provide a confirmation message or email receipt.

title: Analytics and Reports
description: Analytics and Reports offer insights into the overall performance of students and the effectiveness of assignments. It provides data and visualizations for analysis.

title: Responsive Design
description: Ensure that your website is mobile-friendly and responsive so that students and instructors can access it from various devices.

title: Feedback Surveys
description: Allow instructors and students to provide feedback on the platform, helping you improve its usability and functionality.
